Package edu.ucla.sspace.mains

Class Summary
BeagleMain An executable class for running Beagle from the command line.
CoalsMain An executable class for running Coals from the command line.
ESAMain An executable class for running ExplicitSemanticAnalysis (ESA) from the command line.
EvaluatorMain Evaluates the performance of SemanticSpace instances on provided benchmarks.
FixedDurationTemporalRandomIndexingMain The executable class for running FixedDurationTemporalRandomIndexing from the command-line.
GenericMain A base class for running SemanticSpace algorithms.
GrefenstetteMain An executable class for running Grefenstette algorithm from the command line.
HALMain An executable class for running HyperspaceAnalogueToLanguage (HAL) from the command line.
IsaMain An executable class for running IncrementalSemanticAnalysis (ISA) from the command line.
LoggerUtil A utility class for setting the logging level output of the S-Space package.
LRAMain An executable class for running LatentRelationalAnalysis from the command line.
LSAMain An executable class for running LatentSemanticAnalysis (LSA) from the command line.
OptionDescriptions A utility class that contains string descriptions of differnt command line options.
PurandareMain An executable class for running PurandareFirstOrder from the command line.
RandomIndexingMain An executable class for running RandomIndexing from the command line.
